td.content: s:a 39 yo white f presents with 4 days history of worsening mild bleeding between periods, mild weakness, mild persistent fatigue and Blood. she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 2 years pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 163 cm, Weight 47.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 18 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC, serum iron, TIBC.
